item.description:
Join us for Mandalas, Meditation, and Mysticism: A hands-on workshop with Eileen Carlotto

Mandalas, or circle drawings, are an ancient art form used to represent the cosmos and our relationship to mystic realms. In this workshop, you will create and color your own mandala for insights into your personal spiritual journey. You will also learn a form of meditation that will allow you to explore the realms of love and light within you.  Bring your inspiration; we’ll provide drawing supplies and refreshments.

Eileen is a middle-school art teacher. A student of meditation for over 30 years, she offers classes and workshops on various aspects of meditation and spirituality. Married, with two grown children and a full-time job, she demonstrates how we can integrate spiritual practice into our busy lives.
